project.name: C-C089C-WIRE-05-ST03-DT05-DF04-CF02-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C089C-WIRE-05-ST03-DT05-DF04-CF02-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Good inputs: 1) name of shipper for use in Sql databaseBad inputs:SQL argument injection

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="shipper1" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C089C-WIRE-05-ST03-DT05-DF04-CF02-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Good inputs: 1) name of shipper for use in Sql databaseBad inputs:SQL argument injection

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="BadShipper'), ('80','BadShipper2" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_n2ONBQVgUjHktvoyT87a AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_aPZ0KldUUm OR db_sql_output_QE4DzJdt6B OR database_insert_check_tuMMfnmRXf) AND NOT timeout_EFVJfUZKsZ) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_aPZ0KldUUm OR db_sql_output_QE4DzJdt6B OR database_insert_check_tuMMfnmRXf) OR timeout_EFVJfUZKsZ OR controlled_exit_yRgQSYLQY7)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_aPZ0KldUUm OR db_sql_output_QE4DzJdt6B OR database_insert_check_tuMMfnmRXf) AND NOT timeout_EFVJfUZKsZ) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_aPZ0KldUUm OR db_sql_output_QE4DzJdt6B OR database_insert_check_tuMMfnmRXf) OR timeout_EFVJfUZKsZ OR controlled_exit_yRgQSYLQY7))

output_checks.simple_check: if `mysql -u $DBMYSQLUSER --password=$DBMYSQLPASSWORD -h $DBMYSQLHOST -D $SS_DBMYSQLDATABASE -e "select * from Shippers;" | grep -q "BadShipper2\|ShipAttack"`; then true; else false; fi;
